name: The Blacklight Arena
description:
Interstellar Pirates and Soldiers battle it out for claim over the recently discovered Planet Emperion. Its rich resources could make any adventurous space traveler wealthy beyond belief. The only way to settle this epic dispute? Cosmic golf of course! 

Choose a side in this 5v5 arena-style shooter where teams battle it out to hit an explosive golf ball into the opposing team’s goal! But being the first to score your team's ball is the least of your worries, since everyone is armed! 

 

Play in an arena inspired by Blacklight golf courses! 

 

Use 5 Strikers that each affect the ball in unique ways - and double as melee weapons!

 

Race to be the first team to get your ball to the enemy's goal to win!
